class.name: AwsConnection
class.description: Stores information and configuration for the access to Amazon Web Services.

param.name: awsRegionName
param.description: Region where this connection will be used.

param.name: projectFeatureId
param.description: Custom identifier for this AWS Connection

param.name: awsCredentialsType
param.description: The way how to obtain credentials (just provide the keys, assume IAM role or other)

param.name: awsSessionCredentials
param.description: Whether to use temporary credentials provided by STS service

param.name: awsStsEndpoint
param.description: Endpoint from where to obtain session credentials

option.name: iamRole
option.description: Uses another (principal) AWS connection to assume an IAM Role with its permissions. Please, note that the principal connection should have rights to assume the role, more: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/workdocs/latest/developerguide/wd-iam-grantdev.html

param.name: awsIamRoleSessionName
param.description: An identifier for the assumed role session. Use the role session name to uniquely identify a session when the same role is assumed by different principals or for different reasons.

param.name: awsConnectionId
param.description: Principal AWS Connection ID (Who will assume the IAM Role)

param.name: awsStsEndpoint
param.description: Endpoint from where to obtain session credentials of the assumed IAM Role

option.name: default
option.description: Looks for credentials in this order: Env Vars - AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY Java System Properties - aws.accessKeyId and aws.secretKey Web Identity Token credentials from the environment or container Credential profiles file at the default location (~/.aws/credentials) Credentials delivered through the Amazon EC2 container service if AWS_CONTAINER_CREDENTIALS_RELATIVE_URI" environment variable is set and security manager has permission to access the variable, Instance profile credentials delivered through the Amazon EC2 metadata service more: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sdk-for-java/v1/developer-guide/credentials.html
